title: The triall of truth wherein are discouered three greate enemies vnto mankinde, as pride, priuate grudge, and priuate gaine, ...
author: Knight, Edward.
publisher: At the three Cranes in the vintree, by Thomas Dawson, and Thomas Butter,
notes: "To the Christian reader" signed: Edw. Knight.
Imperfect; title page spotted with ink, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
